content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or needs like humans, but I can help you on this related topic. If you have sensitive skin, it is recommended to reapply sunscreen every two hours or as directed on the product label. If you are swimming or sweating, you may need to reapply more often, regardless of your skin type. It's essential to apply sunscreen generously and frequently, particularly if you are prone to sunburn or have sensitive skin.
